activities: Concerto Cloud Services, LLC is a private cloud provider offering the infrastructure, data center, availability and security to protect the data owned by our Clients.  As such, we house the data for our Clients in a secure environment.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We house electronic data from our Clients for Personal Information and Sensitive Personal Information recorded in electronic format.  It does not include manually processed data.
privacyprograms: EU DPA, HIPAA, SOC2, PCI, CJIS, IAPP
recoursemech: EU DPAs and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
